articles.title: Trump announces new tariffs of up to 40% on a growing number of countries - CNN
articles.description: President Donald Trump cranked up the pressure Monday on America’s trading partners, firing off letters to heads of several countries, informing them of their new tariff rate. But at the same time, Trump took some of the edge off by signing an executive actio…

articles.title: 200 million year-old jawbone revealed as new species - BBC
articles.description: The newly discovered flying reptile is the oldest pterosaur in North America.
articles.content:
Victoria GillScience correspondent, BBC News
The new pterosaur has been named Eotephradactylus mcintireae, meaning 'ash-winged dawn goddess'
